result.title: Community activation and involvement monitoring report
result.description: Community members included in the process of the energy transition will be local authorities, local industry representatives, members of the educational institutions, representatives of civil society organisations and average community members themselves. Multi-sectoral coordination among all actors will be the role of a transitional board which establishes and maintains a feedback loop with the broader community. Community energy systems (CES) are established and their outputs with regard to the energy transition goals are documented.

result.title: Working paper on the NAVIGATOR methodology
result.description: This deliverable will detail the multi-method approach developed for the NAVIGATOR project combining inductive and deductive research strategies into an abductive process, using both small-N and large-N methods. A draft version of the working paper will be used during the joint methodology training session taking place in month 4, and input received in the workshop will be fed into the final version of the working paper (m6). The methodology workshop and the working paper will ensure that all project participants are trained in the methodology ensuring comparable results across the substantive WPs.

result.title: Services, Tools and Components (interim release)
result.description: D4.2 will consist of software code and a report, updating the output of D4.1. D4.2 will include an updated inventory of existing and prioritised tools and services (result of T4.1). D4.2 will also include a significantly increased number of tools and services integrated within the ELG (result of T4.2-4.5). The respective task leaders will be responsible for integration of tools and services for each LT category (i.e., task), with two thirds of the relevant prioritised ones from T4.1 are now integrated in ELG, achieving also balanced language coverage. All integrated tools and services will thus contribute towards the interim ELG release (M26). An initial report on integration activities with 3rd party providers (T4.6) will be included.

result.title: Strategies and recommendations for stimulation operations for the four Variscan reservoir types
result.description: Based on the results of D51 to D56 and D58 to D59 we will evaluate stimulation strategies for the four Variscan reservoir types The geological technical and financial risk analysis of the stimulation actions are an essential part not only for the demos sites but also in view of the European scale D74 to D78

result.title: Platform GUI (interim release)
result.description: Software code and report. The interim release of the platform GUI will include an updated version of the CMS system from T3.3 and an updated set of GUI features for the portal (T3.4). This GUI version will contain updated public website content, integrated training materials, video and any other related services provided by other relevant WPs. The GUI and D3.3 will include the preliminary version of the catalogue UI.
